workSpecialization.title: 4501 : Services for project engineering, for design and pre-design developments, development of a basic project (pre-FEED, FEED). 4540 Construction, reconstruction and installation of an automation system, telemechanization and communication, including automation of technological processes, industrial control systems, instrumentation and automation systems, technological / commercial accounting, communication and warning systems, LANs, etc.

subscribeForm.title: Подписаться на новости
subscribeForm.text: Мы нацелены на развитие партнерских отношений. Если вы хотите стать партнером АО «ТЭК-Торг» или разместить информацию на сайте, присылайте Вашу заявку

applicationForm2.title: We invite you to cooperation
applicationForm2.text: We are committed to developing partnerships. If you want to become a partner of TEK-Torg JSC or post information on the site, send your application.

applicationForm4.title: Request a consultation
applicationForm4.text: We can answer all your questions about using the ETP, from setting up a PC to signing a contract. We’re making procurement more accessible

questionnaireForm.title: Заполните форму анкеты
questionnaireForm.text: Предложения о сотрудничестве с ПАО «НК «Роснефть», представляющие потенциальный интерес для Компании и соответствующие ее актуальным направлениям деятельности, отправляются в виде информационной справки о товарах, работах, услугах, в формате официальных писем. Вы можете оставить свое предложение, заполнив форму ниже.

items.text: You can send technical documentation for stock items specified in the template of a technical and commercial proposal
You can send the general price list of your company

stepForm3.title: Send a presentation
stepForm3.text: Your presentation shall be reviewed by the Supply Center of Inter RAO. Inter RAO Supply Center, then it is sent in accordance with the activity area to a wide range of technical specialists from production facilities and management companies. After studying the presentation materials, the conclusions of experts and questions are sent to your address.
stepForm3.descr: For advice on the work of The Single Window for Technologies Presentation, please contact the Directorate for work with suppliers and authorities of the Inter RAO Supply Center: Yuriy Vitalievich Domoratskiy, the Head of the Division (phone: +7 495 664-88-40 ext. 2763, e-mail: domoratskiy_yv@interrao.ru).

titles.radio2: Willingness to provide products for trial operation
titles.materials1: Please attach all available materials that reveal the essence of the offer
titles.loadTKP: Upload the technical and commercial offer

docs.title: To upload the TCO, download, fill out and attach the filled template *

stepForm4.title: Application for holding a webinar
stepForm4.text: The platform for holding a webinar on the ZOOM platform is provided by the partner — the Electronic Trading Platform TEK-Torg. After the formation of the webinar program, participants and applicants will receive information about the conference and contacts of the moderator. No more than 15 minutes are allotted for the presentation (controlled by the moderator), while the time for discussion is not limited. All materials for preliminary viewing should be provided in advance (prerequisite). Priority in providing the opportunity to hold webinars is given to Russian manufacturers and suppliers.
stepForm4.descr: For advice on the work of The Single Window for Technologies Presentation, please contact the Directorate for work with suppliers and authorities of the Inter RAO Supply Center: Yuriy Vitalievich Domoratskiy, the Head of the Division (phone: +7 495 664-88-40 ext. 2763, e-mail: domoratskiy_yv@interrao.ru).
